searchEngine

Class ImageInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • searchEngine.ImageInfo

  • public class ImageInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Class providing basing elements of an image (file name, location, image data).
    Author:
    Pierre Tirilly - pierre.tirilly@imt-lille-douai.fr

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The name of the image file on disk.

      The folder where the image is stored on disk.

    • Method Detail

      • getImage

        public org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat getImage()
        Returns the image data. The image is loaded from its file if needed. The image data should only be accessed in this way, as it is loaded on demand.
        Returns:
        The image data.

      • getBufferedImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getBufferedImage()
        Returns the image data as a BufferedImage to display it in Java GUI.
        Returns:
        The image data as a BufferedImage.

      • clearImageBuffer

        Frees the memory of the image buffer.

        Parameters:

      • loadImage
